Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04
  • Processor: Pentium N4200 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 500/NVidia GeForce GTS 450/AMD Radeon HD 6770
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Built-in sound card
  • Additional Notes: Use command "sudo su echo "5000" > /sys/class/drm/card0/engine/rcs0/preempt_timeout_ms" if game is closing after launch.
